awd_abstract_narration: Chowan College will initiate a three-week, residential,                         multidisciplinary Young Scholars project offering science                       enrichment activities for 20 precollege students entering grade 10.                                                                                             In this program participants are exposed to a series of intense                 hands-on laboratory activities in biology, chemistry, physics and               computer usage.  Students attend a lecture/laboratory for                       approximately three days in which they learn skills designed to be              used in carrying out research projects.  Three days are spent                   visiting industry and surrounding sights of ecological interest.                The remainder of the time is spent on their research project.                   Summaries are written in journal style and the findings presented               at a mock symposium.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
